title: John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Reservations  During the summer season, tours are generally filled on a first come, first serve basis. If you are traveling in a group of 5 or more people, please make a reservation. Large groups (10 or more people) should contact the site two weeks in advance to determine how they can best be accommodated. Please call 617-566-7937 to make your reservation, or email us. **We do not accept reservations for groups of fewer than five people.**    Permits Some uses of the site, including filming or photographing the interior for commercial purposes require a permit. Please contact Supervisory Ranger Jim Roberts at 617-566-7937 or by email. to discuss your needs and begin the permit process.
